subject: How do you turn on annotation tags?
msgSnippet: I am using Junit4.0 inside eclipse.  I tried adding annotation tags like; @BeforeClass @AfterClass, @Ignore, etc.  They seem to have no effect.  Is there some
messageBody:
I am using Junit4.0 inside eclipse. I tried adding annotation tags
like; @BeforeClass @AfterClass, @Ignore, etc. They seem to have no
effect. Is there some extra step I need to take in order have the
tags take effect?

- Dave
